com.cosm.client.http

Class HttpClientBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cosm.client.http.HttpClientBuilder

  • public class HttpClientBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating HttpClient and allowing downstream application to configure HTTP client behaviours such as retry and timeouts, abstracted from underlying implementation.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static HttpClientBuilder getInstance() 
      void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout) 
      void setRetryCount(int retryCount) 
      void setRetryHandler(HttpRequestRetryHandler httpRequestRetryHandler)
      Use this method to set a custom retry handler, otherwise use setRetryCount(int) to remain abstracted from the underlying implementation.
      void setSocketTimeout(int socketTimeout) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • getInstance

        public static HttpClientBuilder getInstance()

      • setRetryCount

        public void setRetryCount(int retryCount)
        Parameters:
        retryCount - number of retries to be attempted by the http client

      • setRetryHandler

        public void setRetryHandler(HttpRequestRetryHandler httpRequestRetryHandler)
        Use this method to set a custom retry handler, otherwise use setRetryCount(int) to remain abstracted from the underlying implementation.
        Parameters:
        httpRequestRetryHandler -

      • setConnectionTimeout

        public void setConnectionTimeout(int connectionTimeout)
        Parameters:
        connectionTimeout - number of milliseconds before timeout when establising connection, default is DEFAULT_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT_IN_MS

      • setSocketTimeout

        public void setSocketTimeout(int socketTimeout)
        Parameters:
        socketTimeout - number of milliseconds before timeout when waiting for packet response, default is DEFAULT_SOCKET_TIMEOUT_IN_MS
